body.name: Schmidt's Aluminum Free Natural Deodorant for Women and Men, Charcoal and Magnesium with 24 Hour Odor Protection, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Fresh, 2.65 oz, Pack of 4
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 46 mins
features: Really Natural. Really Works. – The First Ecocert Certified Natural Deodorant in the US, Schmidt's Charcoal and Magnesium helps neutralize odor and keeps you fresh with 24 hour odor protection
Certified 100 percent Natural Origin Fragrance – Charcoal and Magnesium Deo features a crisp scent reminiscent of freshly fallen rain, made with essential oils
Proven Protection – Whether you're looking for natural deodorant for women or mens deodorant, our award-winning natural deodorants have over 13,000 5-Star reviews! We have a scent for everyone
Fights Body Odor – 1-2 swipes is all you need for all-day protection with just a small amount. Hold deodorant stick momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat

Plant-Based Ingredients – Schmidt's deodorant without aluminum is formulated to be gentle on skin, using certified 100 percent natural origin ingredients such as odor fighting magnesium and essential oils
body.description: Really Natural. Really Works. Schmidt’s Charcoal and Magnesium is the first Ecocert Certified Natural Deodorant in the US — Formulated with certified 100 percent natural origin ingredients, this natural deodorant for women and men is made without aluminum, and is certified vegan by Vegan Action and Leaping Bunny certified cruelty-free. Our natural deodorant formula helps neutralize odor and keep you fresh, enriched with magnesium, and offers all-day 24 hour odor protection while being gentle on skin. Schmidt’s is made with plant-based oils and butters like coconut oil, jojoba seed oil, and shea moisture butter, as well as vitamin E. Luxurious, long-lasting scents made with 100 percent natural origin fragrance are never synthetic, always made with plant isolates and essential oils like tea tree oil, jasmine oil, and lavender oil. All of our Schmidt’s natural deodorant sticks require only a small amount of application for great results. To use, hold the product momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat. Gently apply a small amount to dry, clean underarms to keep you feeling fresh all day. 1-2 swipes for application are all you need. The non-greasy and non-sticky feel allows the deodorant to be easily absorbed. Do not apply to irritated, damaged or freshly shaved skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural Deodorant that Actually Works Made with: Coconut oil provides a smooth feel, helps with skin nourishmentMagnesium Hydroxide for odor controlEssential Oils for a rich, luxurious aroma 2021 Our Natural Deodorants never contain Aluminum SaltsArtifical FragranceFiller IngredientsParabensPropylene GlycolPhthalates 2021 100% Vegan Regardless of scent or formula, all of our products are 100% vegan 2021 Cruelty - Free We're Leaping Bunny certified Cruelty-Free and proud to say we never test our products on animals. 2021

Our Signature Formula Help neutralize odor and keep you fresh, naturally. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionInnovative ingredients derived from plants and mineralsAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like bergamot, lavender, and roseHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Our Sensitive Skin Formula Smooth and creamy in texture, formulated for those with baking soda sensitivities. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionFree of baking sodaAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like jasmine, coconut, and tea treeHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Our Hemp Formula An elevated take on our Sensitive Skin formula packed with hemp seed oil. Omega and vitamin richFree of baking sodaContains no CBD and no THC24 hour protectionAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like patchouli, sage, and rose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: This product is wonderful my pits don’t stink after a hard hot day outside working. It doesn’t require you to apply as much as a normal deodorant. Just a simple light swipe and that’s it. My pits needed a few days between using it for the first week. Due to slight irritation from my body getting used to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best aluminum-free deodorant I have found
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is all I use now that I have found it. It keeps my pits from stinking, cuts down on perspiration to a reasonable degree, and is relatively chemical-free. It does NOT have a strong scent, but I like that, and my wife likes how I smell when I'm wearing it. what more couldI ask for?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I live Schmidt's deodorant
reviews.reviewText: Been using Schmidt's deodorant since the beginning of the Covid fiasco when my old trusted brand became unavailable.I prefer the Lime over the others I have tried/smelled as it is unique but not overpowering. One application easily works for 24 hrs (12 hrs if working/sweating hard)... I really like the travel sized ones for convenience without paying a premium (same price per once as full size ones when I hast ordered) .The only negative thing I can say is that due the formula being very soft and white, it does show on clothing and I have yet to find an easy way to remove it... I have just adjusted my routine to put pullover shirts on before applying... sounds simple but having done it differently for 50years I still slip up and end up having to hamper a fresh shirt if I forget and mess it up...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great! Unfortunately these leave a bunch of white residue and my job has black long sleeve uniforms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great natural deodorant - soft scent
reviews.reviewText: If you've been on a natural deodorant journey, you are familiar with the stench struggle. This is the first one I've tried that doesn't make me break out and also continues to smell wonderful during the day and after sweating. I've found it takes a while to find the right scent for your body chemistry. I love the rose vanilla for mine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this brand
reviews.reviewText: I switched from Doce deodorant and have been using Schmidt's. It works well. It isn't greasy. It last the whole day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Really Impressed
reviews.reviewText: Glad to know my hunt for a truly clean deodorant is over. This stays on foreverrrr, over 24 hours. It’s easy to over apply, and the bottle isn’t the best made, but I’m happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes me smell like a Xmas tree!
reviews.reviewText: In my desire to use aluminum free deodorant products I tried this, it seemed a good value compared to many ‘natural’ deodorants offered. Firstly the juniper/pine odor is rather strong. Not bad just kind of overpowering. Also, the texture is less like a wax or gel (what I’ve experienced usually with roll-on deodorants) and more a putty/clay. It goes on very thick resulting in using up a container pretty quickly. I’ve attempted to apply it more sparingly - this stuff either doesn’t dispense at all, or blobs onto skin thickly.After this two pack I’ll be moving on to another brand, with a more subtle fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great deodorant, have used while spending a full day in the sun and it absolutely did the job. Absorbed the wetness and smell straight away and with no aluminium.

Love this stuff, it works REALLY well, and chemical free, I'm a regular user of this stuff. The lemon burgomont scent is nice but none of the scents last so may as well just buy the Fragrance-Free. Keep in m,ind that this is deodorant, not antiperspirant, however I do sweat an average amount and it seems to keep it under control. I'm not sure how it would fair with someone who is a heavy sweater. In the past I've had some and it kind of crumbled when I put it on, but that was a one-time thing, maybe a bad stick..Anyway, two thumbs up for me.
Arrivato super rapido con prime. Condizioni perfette. Il deodorante é di alta qualità!

Ich habe schon viele NK-Deocremes durchprobiert (Greendoor, Ponyhütchen, Wolkenseifen, Hello Simple). Die waren auch alle in Ordnung, haben geholfen (kein Schweißgeruch). Aber irgendwie hatte ich immer den ganzen Tag so ein leicht schmieriges Gefühl unter den Armen.Ich mag am liebsten die geruchlosen Varianten.Und dann bin ich auf diesen Deostick gestoßen. Die Anwendung als Stick ist natürlich wesentlich praktischer als als Deocreme (man muss nicht die oft ziemlich feste "Creme" aus dem Tiegel kratzen bzw. mit Wärme "überreden", sondern kann es direkt auftragen). Ja, die Verpackung ist aus Plastik.Aber die Wirkung!!! Einfach wow! Wie gesagt geruchlos. Von der Konsistenz eher nicht so cremig, sondern fester. Lässt sich dennoch gut verteilen nach warmem Hautkontakt. Und hält wirklich den ganzen Tag! Egal, wie heiß es ist, wie sehr man schwitzt. Man riecht nicht! Und, jetzt kommt der Unterschied zu den vorgenannten ausprobierten Deos: Kein schmieriges Gefühl. Man merkt nichts mehr, zieht einfach ein und gut is's.Bin megabegeistert!Nur der Preis ist heftig.Und eine umweltfreundlichere Verpackung wäre auch wünschenswert.Trotzdem klare Kaufempfehlung!
Un desodorante sin tóxicos ni fragancias, cómodo. Veo comentarios de que mancha la ropa pero nunca me ha pasado
